name: SOCOM II U.S. Navy SEALs
summary: SOCOM II U.S. Navy SEALs is a third-person tactical shooter video game for the PlayStation 2 and a sequel to SOCOM U.S. Navy SEALs. The game was developed by Zipper Interactive in collaboration with the Naval Special Warfare Command and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. SOCOM II U.S. Navy SEALs was released on November 4, 2003.
info:
• 中文名: 海豹突击队2
  • 发行: Sony Interactive Entertainment
  • 平台: PS2
  • 游戏类型: TPS / Tactical shooter
  • 游戏引擎: Kinetica
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2003年11月4日
